text.section:
An applicant for a license shall:
Submit an application to the Secretary; and
Pay to the Secretary the application fee set by the Secretary through regulation.

The application shall:
Be on a form and accompanied by any supporting information that the Secretary requires, including documentation that the Maryland Health Care Commission has determined that the freestanding ambulatory care facility either received a certificate of need or is exempt from certificate of need requirements; and
Be signed and verified by the applicant.
